TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebRequestErrorEvent extends System.Web.Management.WebBaseErrorEvent

summary.span: 定义承载有关 Web 请求错误信息的事件。

span.span: Defines the event that carries information about Web-request errors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 请求期间出错时引发。The is raised if an error occurs during a Web request. 你的应用程序应使用此事件来获取与请求相关的信息，如由和类。Your application should use this event to obtain request-related information as defined by the and the classes. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下将使用标准 ASP.NET 运行状况监视类型，并通过设置来控制其行为`healthMonitoring`配置节。In most cases you will use the standard ASP.NET health monitoring types and control their behavior by setting the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 下一个示例中所示，还可以创建自定义类型。You can also create custom types, as shown in the next example. 如果创建自定义事件类型，您需要添加您自己的信息，请自定义方法，这样可以避免覆盖或篡改敏感的系统信息。If you create your custom event type and you need to add your own information, customize the method, this will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information. ## Examples 下面的代码示例包含两个部分。The following code example has two parts. 第一部分是使 ASP.NET 能够使用自定义事件的配置文件的摘录。The first part is an excerpt of a configuration file that enables ASP.NET to use a custom event. 第二部分演示如何从派生类，以创建自定义事件。The second part shows how to derive from the class to create the custom event. ``` ``` [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent/CS/webrequesterrorevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent/VB/webrequesterrorevent.vb#1)]
